[DQC.US.0001.81] The concept RestructuringCharges with a value of 0 is dimensionally qualified with the StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis and the unallowable member EMEAMember. The StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis should only be used with extension members and the following US-GAAP members: us-gaap:SegmentDomain, us-gaap:CorporateAndOtherMember, us-gaap:AllOtherSegmentsMember, us-gaap:CorporateMember.
